definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Puma fur was found clinging to bushes.
sentences.chinese: 灌木叢中也發現了粘在上面的美洲獅毛。

sentences.english: And what are we thinking about the whole cougar movement these days?
sentences.chinese: 我們思考，什麼是對整個美洲獅運動的這些日子？

sentences.english: The experts were now fully convinced that the animal was a puma.
sentences.chinese: 專家們如今已經完全肯定那隻動物就是美洲獅。

sentences.english: Kitten pumas are playful and begin to follow the female on hunts when they are about two months old.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅幼仔好嬉戲，約兩個月後就開始跟隨母獅捕食。

sentences.english: Unlike most other desert animals, mountain lions are active during the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 和大部分沙漠動物不同，美洲獅在白天十分活躍。

sentences.english: Pumas are large, cat-like animal which are found in America.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅是體型像貓的大動物，產於美洲。

sentences.english: Puma is a kind of catlike animals.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅是一種貓科動物。

sentences.english: And the result came to be the Mercury Mystique and later on became the Mercury Cougar.
sentences.chinese: 和結果後來被水銀的神祕感，後來就成了汞美洲獅。

sentences.english: The ears and tail tip of puma are generally dark.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅的耳和尾尖通常是呈深色。

sentences.english: Pumas are large, cat-like animals which are found in America。
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅是一種體形似貓的大動物，產於美洲。

sentences.english: I saw a bear and a mountain lion on my last hike.
sentences.chinese: 我上次旅行還看見一隻熊和一隻美洲獅。

sentences.english: Last year, things weren't looking good for cougars.
sentences.chinese: 去年，事情並沒有尋找美洲獅好。

sentences.english: Pumas will not attack a human being unless it is cornered.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅除非被逼得走投無路，是絕不會傷人的。

sentences.english: Like the cheetahs and pumas in North America, the tiger slipped through by a whisker.
sentences.chinese: 就像北美的獵豹與美洲獅一樣，老虎逃過一劫。

sentences.english: The ears and tail tip of pumas are generally dark.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅的耳和尾尖通常呈深色。

sentences.english: When times are lean, pumas will take their chances with other prey.
sentences.chinese: 食物匱乏的時候，美洲獅也會尋找機會捕捉其他獵物。
